message.body: You're not playing WoW at work are you?
No lol
I was gonna say if you are, you might have a problem
Def. have problems
That's not one of them usually
the heroin is fine, but once you're playing wow at work youre in trouble
Actually, I'm feeling pretty good about my WoW habits after my friend showed me some of the things people do in Minecraft
And after he told me about the latest Final Fantasy releases
Those people are LOTS crazier than I am
thats true. Im def out of the loop, and grateful to be. I have to convince myself sometimes to not play games, and I don't keep a gaming system at my house
Entertainment is important, but lately I just find that I have too much to do.
What are your thoughts on Second Life?
It's an abomination
Did you see Gamer?
I didn't see it but heard of it. It seems kind of ridiculous.
What's to separate WoW from becoming a Second Life?
I'm sure for some people WoW is a kind of Second Life
Especially on the RP servers
But I normally see WoW players here as competing rather than living in the game
While there are times of deep personal investment, I think it's all toward the goal of becoming the best or overcoming an obstacle, rather than simply existing in virtual space
It shares some of the components, but yes WoW is more structured and 'quest' driven. It does make we wonder how long it will be before we're walking around 'Facebookland' in virtual reality
